chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
Packages should have been delivered since two days between 10:00 and 14:00. It's being postponed until 19:00 but nothing arrives yet.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has not yet received the delivery. The status has not changed since 05/28/24.

Could you please contact the supplier and ask where the package is.

Noah Schäfer
Luruper weg 1
25469 Halstenbek
Deutschland
+491718131422
noahschaefer2007@gmail.com

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have informed our logistics partner regarding this matter. We will let you know if there are any updates. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The CND attached is invalid, as the IMEI is not handwritten. Please resubmit the CND with the IMEI handwritten. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

Since when does the carrier not accept the form just because the IMEI is not handwritten?

Everything is valid for you to gain time.

90% of our customers fill out the entire form digitally, and there have never been any problems with carriers because of this.

Please send a tracking link for a replacement, today, or this order will be refunded.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

After reviewing the CND, we have decided that it is valid. We will proceed with the necessary actions. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

I will refund the customer.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team
